dt: {bc}any of a group of colors between red and yellow in hue, of medium to low lightness, and of moderate to low saturation
{bc}people belonging to any of various population groups considered as having medium {d_link|pigmentation|pigmentation} of the skin
The plural noun {wi}browns{/wi} is mostly used in phrases referring to multiple population groups, as in {ldquo}policies that disproportionately affect Blacks and {it}browns{/it}.{rdquo}

shortdef: any of a group of colors between red and yellow in hue, of medium to low lightness, and of moderate to low saturation
people belonging to any of various population groups considered as having medium pigmentation of the skin
